quality upload for small file, good work vice rock, thanks
Aspect ratio is way off - flat land. Force it to 16:9.
Mate I dont usually comment on things unless they are horribly bad in some way, but the quality of this upload for its size blew me away, thanks very much
Aspect ratio of this film is 1.85:1, not 2.35:1 as this rip is. Quality may be high, but everyone is short and fat!

here's a temp. fix for the AR:
in BSPlayer, goto Video | Aspect Ratio & select 16:9 (or shift 2)
in MPC, start the movie, press 8 on the number pad until there is only 1" black bar  remaining

video bitrate is 2263 Kbps & sharp!
